name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kallo: Never miss a better price

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Super-fast, effortless price comparison on 100,000+ websites - now with ChatGPT by your side.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Kallo is an AI-powered shopping assistant that shows you where to find the cheapest price for any product, across multiple websites, in under a second. âš¡ ğŸ’¸ 

It also answers any questions you have about an item - within the product's webpage, using ChatGPT. ğŸ’¡ ğŸ›ï¸

FEATURES:

Price Comparison: We compare millions of prices across thousands of merchants without you spending precious time searching multiple websites! No matter where you are, we find the best price in your local currency. ğŸ’µğŸ’·ğŸ’¶ğŸ’´

Chat: Ask questions in a chat-style pop up on any of your favorite websites and get instant answers e.g. '"Does this laptop have bluetooth?"


Price & Stock Monitoring: We can inform you when a price drops or an item is back in stock on any of your favorite websites (COMING SOON)

--------

Add the extension and shop as you normally would. Kallo will pop up you when there's a better price than the item you're looking at. ğŸ·ï¸ğŸ“‰

IMPORTANT: 
- Any answers given by us feed from ChatGPT and should only be used as a guide
- ChatGPT does not have the best info on things that happened after 2021
- For the best experience, click on the 'Extensions' button and 'Pin' (ğŸ“Œ) Kallo to your toolbar 

We regularly review feedback sent to: developer@kallo.io
